page.errorTitle: Error: Remember to close any other applications before starting an appointment - {{ applicationName }}

mainHeading.title: Remember to close any other applications before starting an appointment with {{ subject.givenName }}

mainBody.paragraph1: For example, Outlook, Teams or NDelius.
mainBody.paragraph2: You must also close other people's assessments or plans if you have them open in other tabs.
mainBody.paragraph3: Do not let {{ subject.givenName }} use your device either.
mainBody.paragraph4: This is to avoid sharing sensitive information.
mainBody.checkBoxLabel: I confirm I'll do this before starting an appointment
